channel.title: Brains and Behavior on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: GPT-5 Doesn't Dislike You—It Might Just Need a Benchmark for Emotional Intelligence
item.description: Researchers studying the emotional impact of tools like ChatGPT propose a new kind of benchmark that measures a models’ emotional and social impact.
